candidates.why: Same session family; enumerates WFS sessions, reads workflow-session.json, uses recent-session selection patterns.
Same artifacts (.workflow/active/WFS-*); covers session discovery and conflict handling patterns.
Same session metadata file; demonstrates state transitions and safe/atomic file operations conventions.
Shows JSON read/modify/write patterns and optional interactive behavior; related lifecycle step after completion.
Contains a 'Session Resume' section but focuses on execution sessions rather than WFS workflow sessions.

selected.why: Closest match for session discovery + metadata inspection without introducing archival/interactive complexity.
